<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potion of Resistance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2951)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=672" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Drinking this thick, fortifying potion grants resistance against a single damage type for 1 hour. Each potion of resistance is created to defend against acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage (and is called a _lesser potion of fire resistance_ or the like).

</column>
